title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 8-A - Affidavit identifying party (agency)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 8-A - Affidavit identifying party (agency)

State Regulations
22 NYCRR
207.55
(b)(2) Form 8-A
(Affidavit

Identifying

Party-Agency)
12/97
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of Adoption of (Docket)
(File) No. A Child Whose First Name Is
AFFIDAVIT
IDENTIFYING
PARTY
(Agency)
________
STATE OF NEW YORK)
)ss.: COUNTY OF)
[FN1] (That (s)he is an attorney at law
duly licensed to practice under the laws of the State of New York and has (his)
(her) office at;)

That (s)he knows (and) and knows that
s(he) (they)(is)(are) the same person(s) described in and who executed the
annexed
(iv), CPLR 315 (Order of

Publication
______________
Affiant

Sworn to before me this day of, 19. ______________
Judge of the Court
[FN1] Delete if
inapplicable

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form
8-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
